description_localized.en: Spacious and Luxuriously Appointed, the Deluxe Suite offers the Space and extra Comfort to entertain visitors and family. Measuring 41- 54 Sqm, this spacious suite features a Queen or King size bed and a Separate Contemporary Lounge Area with Comfortable Sofas, Working Desk and Dining Table. The Suite offers spectacular views of the Corniche and West Bay area. Non-Smoking Rooms available"
